info.name: Basic Dark Gray Scrollbars for Firefox
info.description: Basic dark gray scrollbars for Firefox and other Mozilla based browsers. Scrollbar up and down buttons are forced to always appear, thanks to user 95149 for the fix. Read "Notes" for important info.
info.additionalInfo:
Firefox plans to drop xul soon, which is what these are based on, but I'm sure some of the other Mozilla based browsers will continue to support it. One cool aspect of these scrollbars is that I added the specificity for certain selectors to override Ft DeepDark so they're compatibile with it (DeepDark is pretty awesome, but I was never crazy about the scrollbars). Another cool aspect is that the scrollbar up and down buttons are forced to always appear, thanks to user 95149 for the fix.

These scrollbars are set to be applied globally, but you can change them to only be applied to specific areas/sites pretty easily by altering the @-moz-doc.
